item.title: SOLID Principles
item.description: Software development is hard and there is a lot to know and understand in order to be a good developer. When it comes to Object Oriented Programming which is central to languages like Java and .Net, it becomes harder to build features using OOP, as you need to build everything using classes, objects, and properties. We need to design classes, objects, and properties in a way which are easy to understand, easy to reason about, and above all, easy to maintain.
